name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour + The Catch: Carp & Coarse
name_original: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour + The Catch: Carp & Coarse
description: Two great fishing titles for one special price! Whether you are after the thrill of Bass Fishing, with an authentic career mode, competing against over 100 of the best anglers on the planet or a Carp and Coarse species hunter experience, taking on the hunt of a lifetime for monster-sized fish around the world – this bundle offers both!
